manifestDesc.message: Table based Traditional Chinese Input Method

input_tables_description.message: Input tables displayed in the input menu.

shift_punctuation_description.message: Enable you to enter symbols with Shift + Punctuation keys.

shift_letter_description.message: Enable you to enter symbols with Shift + Letter keys.

associated_phrases_description.message: A list of associated phrases will appear when a character is entered.

wildcard_matching_description.message: Enable you to use the wildcard character (*) when you are not sure about the exact radical.

clear_on_errors_description.message: Clear all entered radicals when an error occurs.

reverse_radical_lookup_description.message: It is useful when you enter a character with the wildcard character (*).

shift_toggle_alphabet_mode.message: Use Shift Key to Toggle Alphabet Mode:

shift_toggle_alphabet_mode_description.message: Pressing the Shift key will switch between Alphabet Mode and Chinese Input Mode.

use_notification_description.message: Show a notification when switching between Alphabet Mode and Chinese Input Mode.
